title: The Client (1994) Tommy Lee Jones (DVDrip, subs ENG ESP PT-BR)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109446/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109446/</a>

Optional English, Spanish and Portugese subtitles in srt format

John Grisham's breathtaking drama about a young boy who witnesses a mafia suicide. Fantastic performance by Susan Sarandon (as always), and promising debut by Brad Renfro (then 12).

I found this torrent on the net using PirateBay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here.

Widescreen 576x256, great stereo sound.
Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.
